footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey.
googleSuccessDescription: Welcome! You have successfully signed in.
registerSubtext: Join our community to begin your healing path.
registerSuccessDescription: Please check your email to verify your account.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming and past events.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at this time. Please check back later.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to this ceremony's details.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
formRegisterRequired: Require user to be logged in
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
authRequiredDescription: You must be signed in to perform this action.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the experienced and compassionate guides who will accompany you on your journey.
editGuideDescription: Update the details for this guide.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This will permanently remove the guide's profile.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral brew from the Amazon, made from the Chacruna leaf and the Ayahuasca vine. For centuries, it has been used by indigenous communities for healing, spiritual growth, and connecting with the universe.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The brew induces a deep introspective state, allowing access to the subconscious to release emotional blockages, heal traumas, and gain profound clarity. It's a journey of self-discovery guided by the plant's wisdom.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is not a substance, but a spiritual master that teaches, heals, and guides. It helps us understand our purpose, connect with our essence, and see life from a more loving and compassionate perspective.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: It offers a clear perspective on your life, helping you understand your path and purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It allows you to release traumas, fears, and emotional patterns that limit your potential.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It fosters a profound sense of unity with nature, the universe, and your own divine essence.
groupCeremonyDescription: Share the experience in a safe space, supported by the group's collective energy.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience for those seeking deep, focused work.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about Ayahuasca, its origin, its benefits, and the sacred respect with which we approach this ancestral tool.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced facilitators who create a safe and caring environment for your transformation.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound experience. Discover our recommendations for body, mind, and spirit.
contactCommunityText: Join our community and start your healing journey. Follow us on our networks and feel free to write to us if you have any questions.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: A verification link has been sent to your new email.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Your guide to preparing body, mind, and spirit for a transformative ceremony.
preparationProcessTitle: The Four Pillars of the Process
preparationProcessDescription: We accompany you in a holistic process that covers four key stages to ensure a deep and lasting transformation.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space where, guided by ancestral songs and deep respect, you connect with the medicine to heal and release.
experienceProcessDescription: An introspective journey where you will receive visions, messages, and a deep understanding of your being and your path.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we support you in incorporating the teachings into your daily life for lasting change.
dietSubtitle: For one week before the ceremony, we recommend a clean diet to prepare your body and spirit.
allowedFoodsList: Fresh fruits and vegetables, whole grains (rice, quinoa), legumes, lean meats (chicken, fish), water, and herbal teas.
prohibitedFoodsList: Red meat, pork, processed foods, sugars, dairy, spicy foods, alcohol, and caffeine.
mentalPrepSubtitle: The mindset with which you arrive is crucial. We suggest these practices:
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and open the heart.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you wish to heal or understand. Write down your intentions.
reflectionDescription: Write about your emotions and expectations. It is a powerful tool for self-knowledge.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony is an opportunity to confront and release deep emotions. It is a space of non-judgment where every feeling is valid. Trust the process, allow yourself to feel, and know that our guides are there to support you with love and compassion at every moment. Liberation is the first step towards true inner peace.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: To ensure your comfort, we recommend bringing the following:
comfortItemsList: Comfortable clothing (preferably white), a blanket or sleeping bag, a pillow or cushion, a change of clothes.
essentialsList: A bottle of water, a notebook and pen, a flashlight, personal hygiene items.
authRequiredJourneyDescription: Sign in or create an account to start your preparation guide and access exclusive content.
preparationGuideSubtitle: Follow these steps to prepare for your experience.
preparationCompleteDescription: You have completed all the preparation steps. Now, open your heart and trust the process. We are waiting to accompany you on this sacred journey.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: This is a summary of the answers you provided.
errorRequiredDetails: Please provide details if you answered 'Yes'.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (heart, blood pressure, etc.)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants)?
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions (schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, etc.)?
questionnaireExperience: Do you have previous experience with psychoactive substances or spiritual plants?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please share a brief summary of your experience:
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: I want to heal emotional wounds, find my purpose, connect with my inner self...
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: This is the information submitted by the user.
noAnswersSubmitted: No answers have been submitted for this user yet.
userManagementSubtitle: View, manage, and communicate with your users.
allUsersDescription: A list of all registered users in your application.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
emailSubjectPlaceholder: A message from El Arte de Sanar
invitationTabDescription: Manage the WhatsApp message templates used to invite users to complete their questionnaire.
newTemplateMessageES: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at El Arte de Sanar. You can do it here: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/artedesanar
newTemplateMessageEN: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at The Art of Healing. You can do it here: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/artedesanar
selectInvitationTemplateDescription: Choose a message to send to {{name}} via WhatsApp.
invitationSent: WhatsApp opened with the pre-filled message.
exportDataDescription: Download a JSON file with all your application data.
importDataDescription: Import data from a JSON file. This will overwrite existing data.
importWarningDescription: This action is destructive and will overwrite all existing data in your database with the data from the selected file. This cannot be undone.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before your last import. You can roll back to this state if something went wrong.
rollbackWarningDescription: This will restore the database to the state it was in right before your last import. Are you sure you want to proceed?
rollbackSuccessDescription: The previous data has been restored.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review conversations between users and the AI guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to see the full message history.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been started yet.
chatbotWelcome: Greetings, seeker. I am the Spiritual Guide of 'El Arte de Sanar'. How may I illuminate your path today?
chatbotError: I apologize, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again in a moment.
errorLogsSubtitle: Review errors that have occurred in the application.
systemLogsDescription: This table shows all automatically logged errors.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this error log?
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the selected error.
featureComingSoon: This feature is under development and will be available soon!
themeCustomizationDescription: Modify the application's color palette for light and dark modes.
themeUpdateReload: The page will now reload to apply the changes.
analyticsDescription: Track user interactions with different sections of the site.
resetAnalyticsConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all click-tracking data. This action cannot be undone.
assignCeremonyDescriptionAdmin: Select the ceremonies this user should have access to.
noCeremoniesFound: No ceremonies have been created yet.
myCeremoniesSubtitle: Here are the ceremonies you are registered for. You can access exclusive content and preparation materials here.
noAssignedCeremoniesDescription: You are not yet registered for any ceremonies. Explore our upcoming events to find your next journey.
notFoundDescription: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't seem to exist.
coursesDescription: Here you will find a series of videos to help you prepare. Required courses are essential for your process, while optional ones are for deepening your knowledge.
noCoursesInCategory: There are no courses in this category yet.
authRequiredCoursesDescription: Log in or register to access our preparation courses.
addCourseDescription: Fill in the details for the new course.
editCourseDescription: Update the details for this course.
deleteCourseConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete this course and cannot be undone.
noCoursesAvailable: No courses have been added to the application yet.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Previous Events' section. This action can be undone.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: Inactive ceremonies are only visible to administrators. This action can be undone.
ceremonyMovedToPast: It will now appear in the 'Previous Events' section.
resetCountersConfirmDescription: This will reset the view and click counters for this ceremony to zero. This cannot be undone.
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please either select a video file or provide a URL.
editHeroVideoDescription: Replace the main video on the home page by providing a new URL or uploading a file.
